A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love Star Wars. Hearing the soundtrack was enough to get me hyped. Unlike many people\, I am enjoying and loving the new movies. They may not have the same feeling of the old ones\, but the universe continues and its nice to see that it's kept alive. I loved how they used a puppet Yoda instead of CGI to remind us of his interactions with Luke. \n\nFRESH
